pullrequest.title: Added urdf gazebo extension option to disable fixed joint lumping

content.raw: I just added them for consistency with other sdf extensions, but they are not actually used for implementing the feature. The real information is stored in the implementation global variable `g_fixedJointsNotReduced`, so we can eventually get rid of the additional member variables.
content.html: I just added them for consistency with other sdf extensions, but they are not actually used for implementing the feature. The real information is stored in the implementation global variable g_fixedJointsNotReduced, so we can eventually get rid of the additional member variables.
